quote: What a man wants is a mate and what a woman wants is infinite security,’ and, ‘What a man is is an arrow into the future and a what a woman is is the place the arrow shoots off from.
quote_letters: WHAT A MAN WANTS IS A MATE AND WHAT A WOMAN WANTS IS INFINITE SECURITY AND WHAT A MAN IS IS AN ARROW INTO THE FUTURE AND A WHAT A WOMAN IS IS THE PLACE THE ARROW SHOOTS OFF FROM
